description: This file defines a React component named ProductCard used for displaying product details and providing an 'Add to Order' button within a point-of-sale system frontend. It imports React and a custom hook useCart, and exports the ProductCard component that interacts with cart state and handles user actions.

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Handles adding the product to the cart and triggers callback functions for success or error

ctags.name: ProductCard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProductCard({ product, onAdd, onError }) {$/
